name: Samurai Shadow Legends
description:
Can one man beat all the world to take revenge for himself?

Play as an angry samurai finding solace in revenge. Learn how to become an assassin and master all the weapons. Fight against monster and their bosses. It will be difficult to kill them as time past but do not loose hope.
Are you capable of becoming a hero you think you are?

*Main Features*
• Easy to Play
• Fight Against Bosses
• Wide Range of Samurai Characters
• Learn Samurai Skills before the Fight
• Multiple Environments for Sword Fighting
• Upgradeable Weapons
